scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n "SERVER,CLIENT,LAUNCH,LOGS" -c "blue,green,magenta,yellow" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client" "node tools/dev_launcher.js" "powershell -File tools/log_aggregator.ps1"
scripts.dev:server: nodemon --watch src/server --watch src/shared -e ts,json --exec "ts-node src/server/index.ts" > logs_server.txt 2>&1
scripts.build: npx prisma generate && npm run build:client && npm run build:server && echo [DEBUG] Listing ROOT dist-client: && ls -R dist-client || echo ROOT MISSING && echo [DEBUG] Listing SRC/CLIENT dist-client: && ls -R src/client/dist-client || echo SRC/CLIENT MISSING
scripts.start:prod: npx prisma migrate deploy; node dist-server/server/index.js
